sourcesContent: import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Modal, Button, Card, ListGroupItem, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const PickupPoints = ({history}) => { const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin useEffect(() => { if (!userInfo ) { history.push('/login') } }, [history, userInfo]) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); useEffect(() => { handleShow() }, []) return ( <> Cash PickUp Locations Zimbabwe {/* */} Locations List Please see below list of cash pick up locations in different towns in Zimbabwe. SPARE SHOP GLENDALE SPARE SHOP BINDURA SPARE SHOP CHITUNGWIZA NMZ BANK 1st STREET HARARE BARCLAYS BANK MUTARE ZB BANK AVONDALE CBZ TAKAWIRA STREET SPARE SHOP GWERU SPARE SHOP GUTU SPARE SHOP CHIREDZI SPARE SHOP GOKWE {/* */} ) } export default PickupPoints
